European countries have been one of the most famous and attractive places in the world we live in,and France is one of them, a must visit place for everyone. Parisis the capital city,and the country’s total population is 67,348,000. It is a beautiful country bordered by Spain and Andorra to the South, Switzerland and Italy to the East and Belgium,

Switzerland is a beautiful country in Europe and this destination is among the top most destinations which generally people prefer to visit. Switzerland is filled with astonishing natural bliss, magnificent Alps, serene lakes, calm villages and cosmopolitan cities and sky kissing castles.

The country of Italy epitomises the holiday destination of dreams. It is a nation that is defined by magnificent cities, ancient sights, cultural treasures, and beautiful scenery.
